remarks: Inductive definition for the indexed union at a successor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2016.)
statement:
iunsuc.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
iunsuc.2 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
iunsuc $p |- U_ x e. suc A B = ( U_ x e. A B u. C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
